now<WH4994> behold,<WH2009> this<WH2088> town<WH5892> is near<WH7138> [enough] to flee<WH5127> to, and it is small.<WH4705> Please,<WH4994> let me escape<WH4422> there<WH8033> (is it not small<WH4705>?) that my life<WH5315> may be saved.<WH2421> "
